page.title: 12THE RIVER TEES
page.content: The {Tees}was a salmon river in the first Domesday book,but since the{ {Industrial Revolution}brought the chemical and steel industries to its banks, pollution stopped the salmon. For ten years, the Water Board and councils have been making rules to clean up the Tees. The local evening paper,the Gazette,reported on Monday, May 16th.,1985,that a massive 2 million cubic metres of oxygen was to be injected into the river. The salmon are coming back now. In fact there are so many that salmon poachers are now at work.
